summary: Experienced executive/leader with a strong delivery track record in an international environment in the petro-chemical industry for 20+ years. Energetic, passionate, outgoing person that enjoys working up, down and across organizations. Strong community leader, supply chain & operations professional, board of directors of multiple companies, change leader in a virtual and global environment in crisis situations as well through continuous improvement.

profile_positions.description: OMP (www.omp.com) helps companies facing complex planning challenges to excel, grow and thrive by offering the best digitized supply chain planning solution in the market. This is a fast growing optimization capability for which OMP is a market leader. As a business strategy consultant, thereby leveraging my past years experience of implementatation of OMP at Shell Chemicals, I'm supporting OMP on their journey to further strenghten their capabilities and their position in the market.
profile_positions.title: Business Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description: BlueAlp is a company in the Netherlands that has developed proprietary technology to chemically convert plastics waste into valuable feed for the Chemicals industry (www.bluealp.nl). The technology has been successfully demonstrated in production-scale facilities and BlueAlp has recently embarked on a scale-up growth journey to bring its technology to the Chemicals industry worldwide. Together with my fellow co-CEO and the whole BlueAlp team, I'm excited to be able to support BlueAlp on this journey. Through this, we will contribute in a positive way to a profound challenge of modern society - the way we deal with the plastic waste that we all generate. Plastics in itself are okay - they bring a lot of positives to society - however the way our modern world deals with them, once plastics have fulfilled their purpose, is where the opportunity lies. It is in this space that BlueAlp aims to make a significant positive contribution to the world in the years ahead.
profile_positions.title: Board of Directors / co-CEO

profile_positions.description: Global leader that drove and delivered the business improvement agenda across Shell Chemicals globally in order to identify, develop and implement new (innovative) ways of working (incl. digital) to enable Shell Chemicals to improve its global performance and become the best in the PetroChemicals industry. Impact  of the global program touched more than 600 colleagues across the world and delivered in access of 50 mln$/a bottomline improvement.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Global Excellence

profile_positions.description: Chairman & member of board of directors of Shell Chemicals Europe B.V, a company registered in the Netherlands (KvK 24332907), engaged in trading, selling, handling and producing Chemicals products. Company turnover of 5+ bln euro/a, profit of multiple 100's mln euro/a, and employing ~200 staff in the Netherlands. Business activities that covered all of Europe as well as imports & exports from & to all other parts of the world. Various additional board of directors roles, incl. Shell Chemicals UK Ltd., Shell Chemicals Ventures B.V. and ELLBA B.V.
profile_positions.title: Chairman and member of several boards of directors

profile_positions.description: Responsible leader for all of Shell Chemicals operational activities across Europe, incl. Turkey and Middle East. Key activities include production planning across all assets in the region, feedstock procurement and optimization, procurement and management of Land and Marine logistics services and customer order management. A key aspect of the role is effective management of HSSE (health safety security environment) aspects of the business to ensure operations are conducted safely, responsibly and compliant.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Chemicals Operations EUAF

profile_positions.description: Responsible leader for supply chain management of all Chemicals product lines across Europe and Africa. Key responsibilities include acquisition and optimization of feed intake, optimization of chemical product allocation to internal & external outlets (channel optimization), supply/demand management (short-term to long term strategic), and delivery of customer service (order processing, customer contract management).
profile_positions.title: General Manager Chemicals Supply Chain EUAF

profile_positions.description: Leading Shell Chemicals’ land logistics operations worldwide. Operationally responsible for all road & rail transport as well as bulk storage activities related to the physical distribution of Shell Chemicals’ products. Budget responsibility: 300 million US$/a. Working with ~50 logistics service providers across the globe through service contracts. Designed and implemented an intensive change management program to deliver operational safety performance improvement. Outside Shell, acting as the chairman of the CEFIC Strategic Implementation Group on transport and logistics (CEFIC = Chemicals industry council in Europe). In this capacity, setting the strategic direction and steering the logistics issues and priority program for the Chemicals industry in Europe.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Chemicals Global Land Logistics

profile_positions.description: Member of a global, internal to Shell Chemicals, customer fulfillment consultancy team. Designed and implemented new global business processes in the area of supply chain cost management, customer sales & profitability, market and business strategies and supply chain improvements. Leading global project teams of (senior) managers and experts and managed/coordinated the related change management.
profile_positions.title: Global Supply & Logistics project Manager

profile_positions.description: Leading a pan-European team of 18 supply coordinators, responsible for managing day-2-day supply and demand of Shell’s base chemicals business in Europe.
profile_positions.title: EU Supply Chain Manager

profile_positions.description: Designed and implemented a plant availability and equipment reliability improvement program across all production units at Shell Chemicals’ production site in Moerdijk. As quality focal point for the engineering department, developed and implemented a departmental ISO-9001 quality system.
profile_positions.title: Site Reliability Engineer

profile_positions.description: Research engineer in the area of computational fluid dynamics (CFD). Introduced the application of a new dynamic simulation technique in an engineering environment to solve unique time-dependent problems.
profile_positions.title: Research Engineer
